pytenno.models.bids

class pytenno.models.bids.Bid(id: str, auction: str, user: str, value: int, created: datetime, updated: datetime)[source]

Represents a bid on an auction.

Parameters

  • id (int) – The ID of the bid.

  • auction (str) – The ID of the auction the bid is on.

  • user (str) – The ID of the user who made the bid.

  • value (int) – The amount of platinum placed on the bid.

  • created (datetime.datetime) – The time the bid was made.

  • updated (datetime.datetime) – The time the bid was last updated.
